title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You are in complete control of your responses, whether you realize it or not. The words of others might elicit strong emotional reactions from you that arent necessarily connected to the current situation. A sharp criticism could send you deep into your feelings and trigger a spiral of self-doubt. As you probe further, you likely recognize that some of your awkward traits are compensations for other insecurities. But with consistent positive action, you can evolve into a stronger and more powerful version of you. Rev. Robert Schuller wrote, Let your hopes, not your hurts shape your future. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
